title: Knowledge Domain
content: DOOR Lv 4 Conjuration Action Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium. Melee FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Snap an ally out of any Stun. Difficult Terrain can't slow them down, and they can't be magically Paralyzed or Restrained. Until Long Rest Melee GRASPING VINE Lv 4 Conjuration Bonus Action Summon a giant vine capable of dragging creatures toward itself. 10 Turns 9m Concentration GUARDIAN OF FAITH
